name: DOOM: Eternal - Collector's Edition
storyline: Hell’s armies have invaded Earth. Become the Slayer in an epic single-player campaign to conquer demons across dimensions and stop the final destruction of humanity. The only thing they fear... is you. Experience the ultimate combination of speed and power in DOOM: Eternal - the next leap in push-forward, first-person combat. Discover the Slayer’s origins and his enduring mission to raze hell.
summary: The ultimate bundle for any DOOM fan, the Collector’s Edition contains a Deluxe Edition copy of DOOM: Eternal in an exclusive custom designed Steelbook case, a full-sized wearable DOOM Slayer Helmet replica, a playable cassette tape plus download codes for lossless digital copies of the DOOM (2016) and DOOM: Eternal original soundtracks, a DOOM Lore Book, and a “The Gift of Argent Power” Lithograph.
